items.content_html: **Mini Formatter** is a lightweight and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to format your CSS, HTML, and JavaScript code directly within the browser. Whether you're pasting code, uploading a local file, or working with web-based projects, Mini Formatter ensures that your code is clean, readable, and properly formatted.
items.title: NSTechBytes/Mini-Formatter: **Mini Formatter** is a lightweight and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to format your CSS, HTML, and JavaScript code directly within the browser. Whether you're pasting code, uploading a local file, or working with web-based projects, Mini Formatter ensures that your code is clean, readable, and properly formatted.

items.content_html: A lightweight wrapper over fetch with zero race conditions by default, and everything one could yearn for in a fetching library like timeouts, retries, interceptors and so much more
items.title: zayne-labs/call-api: A lightweight wrapper over fetch with zero race conditions by default, and everything one could yearn for in a fetching library like timeouts, retries, interceptors and so much more

items.content_html: MayaJS is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Node.js, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With MayaJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
items.title: pradeepbgs/mayajs: MayaJS is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Node.js, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With MayaJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.

items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: Drizzle ORM is a lightweight TypeScript-first ORM designed for optimal type safety and SQL query generation, making database interactions straightforward and reliable. It emphasizes simplicity and minimal runtime overhead, making it a good choice for modern TypeScript projects.
items.title: abhik1289/drizzle_learning:  Drizzle ORM is a lightweight TypeScript-first ORM designed for optimal type safety and SQL query generation, making database interactions straightforward and reliable. It emphasizes simplicity and minimal runtime overhead, making it a good choice for modern TypeScript projects.

items.content_html: DynaView is a lightweight and fast JavaScript framework for building dynamic web applications. It features an intuitive API for easy development, reactive state management for smooth updates, and functional programming paradigms. Ideal for both small and complex projects
